description:
Allow a pasted-in crash URL to work.

BUG=124843
TEST=as in bug


Committed: http://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=134610

messages.text:
Peter: for review: you're the omnibox master; please verify
John: FYI

https://chromiumcodereview.appspot.com/10269003/diff/1/content/browser/web_contents/debug_urls.cc
File content/browser/web_contents/debug_urls.cc (right):

https://chromiumcodereview.appspot.com/10269003/diff/1/content/browser/web_contents/debug_urls.cc#newcode17
content/browser/web_contents/debug_urls.cc:17: transition & content::PAGE_TRANSITION_FROM_ADDRESS_BAR ||
I think if you have this bit you can (and should) remove the PAGE_TRANSITION_TYPED check.  We erroneously use TYPED in a number of non-omnibox cases.

LGTM with that change unless there are actually non-address-bar cases you intentionally want to allow.

CQ is trying da patch. Follow status at
https://chromium-status.appspot.com/cq/avi@chromium.org/10269003/7001

subject: Allow a pasted-in crash URL to work.
